861990.name: Awakening of Celestial Demo
861990.description:
This demo consists of a fragment of the first chapter of the story so you can get a taste of the story, get to know the characters, and challenge yourselves with the mini-game we put in the demo.

Features:
o A preview of some CGs
o A preview of some BGMs
o A preview of Gameplay and Mini-Game

Some alteration with the UI will be made after this, so for now some of them will look a little wonky and weird. We hope you enjoy this Demo and give us feedbacks so we can improve this VN for your enjoyment.

LINK! START!!
